qas.question: Where was the Dome of the Rock built?
In what year was the Dome of the Rock finished?
During whose reign was the Dome of the Rock constructed?

plausible_answers.text: the construction of the Dome of the Rock

qas.question: What was the first major event of the early reign of Abd al-Mali?
What year did construction of the Dome of the Rock begin?

plausible_answers.text: during the conflict with Ibn al-Zubayr

qas.question: When was the Kaaba under construction?
What year was the Kaaba completed?

context: The second major event of the early reign of <a2_0>Abd al-Malik<a2_0/> was <b3_0>the construction of the Dome of the Rock<b3_0/> in <a0_0>Jerusalem<a0_0/>. Although the chronology remains somewhat uncertain, the building seems to have been completed in <a1_0><b4_0><b7_0>692<b7_0/><b4_0/><a1_0/>, which means that it was under construction <b6_0>during the conflict with Ibn al-Zubayr<b6_0/>. This had led some historians, both medieval and modern, to suggest that the Dome of the Rock was built as a <b5_0>destination for pilgrimage<b5_0/> to rival the Kaaba, which was under the control of Ibn al-Zubayr.
